parameters.y: a numeric vector: the number of revertant colonies of TA98 Salmonella.
parameters.dose: a numeric vector: the dose level of quinoline (microgram per plate).

reference: Breslow, N.E., 1984. Extra-Poisson variation in log-linear models. Applied Statistics 33(1), 38-44.
description:
Description
“Data for our third example were compiled by Margolin et al. (1981) from an Ames Salmonella
reverse mutagenicity assay. Table 1 shows the number of revertant colonies observed on each of 3 replicate 
plates tested at each of 6 dose levels of quinoline.” (Breslow, 1984, Table 1).
title: Salmonella Reverse Mutagenicity Assay
format: A data frame with 18 observations on the following 2 variables.
